text: La villa del venerdì (internationally released as Husband and Lovers) is a 1991 Italian erotic drama movie directed by Mauro Bolognini and starring Julian Sands, Joanna Pacula, Tchéky Karyo, Lara Wendel, Jeanne Valérie. ==Other websites== * Category:1991 drama movies Category:1990s erotic movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mauro Bolognini
title: Husband and Lovers
